articles.title: 3 Americans among dozens sentenced to death in Congo coup attempt - CBS News
articles.description: A military court in Congo has convicted 37 people, including three Americans, on charges of taking part in a coup attempt and sentenced them to death.
articles.content:
A military court in Congo handed down death sentences Friday to 37 people, including three Americans, after convicting them on charges of taking part in a coup attempt. 
The defendants, most of them… [+4826 chars]

articles.title: Here's what the Boeing strike might mean for flyers - NBC News

articles.title: About half of Americans plan to skip COVID and flu shots. A doctor explains why that is "very concerning." - CBS News
articles.description: It's critical to get COVID and flu vaccinations as we head into the fall and winter months, an infectious disease expert said.
articles.content:
